about_the_game:
This music pack includes battle and town BGM, as well as battle SEs! Ending BGM and save point BGM are also included, which is always nice to have!

Pack Contents
<File Format＞
・ogg
・m4a
<Tracks＞
Total 12 items, BGM : 7, SE : 5
・BGM
1. A city in a mysterious forest
2. Battle
3. Ending
4. Shop
5. Time to sleep_16bit
6. Time to sleep piano
7. World Map
SE
1. Attack Error
2. Buffed
3. Debuffed
4. Take damage
5. Using magic


・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
